questions.uddipok: Suppose, you are an inhabitant of Chawkbazar, Cumilla. The people of your locality suffer greatly due to insufficient water supply. Now, write a letter to the Mayor complaining about the insufficient water supply.

sub_questions.explanation:
10 July 2023
The Mayor
Cumilla City Corporation, Cumilla
Subject : Complaining about the insufficient supply of water.
Sir,
I have the honour to draw your kind attention to the fact that we, the inhabitants of Chawkbazar under Cumilla City. Corporation, are suffering acutely for inadequate supply of water. This problem has been continuing for a long time. But previously, the problem was not so acute (তীব্র). People could cope with the crisis (সংকট) by buying water or collecting it from nearby tubewells. But recently, it has assumed so serious a form that they cannot manage it anyway. Actually, for most part of the day, people remain deprived (বঞ্চিত) of the facility of water supply. In this situation, we. need a rapid solution (সমাধান) to this crisis.
I, therefore, pray and hope that you would be considerate enough to take immediate steps to solve the-problem of insufficient water supply and oblige thereby.
Yours faithfully,
Pavel Rahman
On behalf of the people of Chawkbazar area under Cumilla City Corporation

questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on 'Natural Calamities' within 200 words.

sub_questions.explanation:
Natural Calamities
A natural calamity is a destructive (ধংসাত্মক) force of nature that causes huge damage and devastation, Bangladesh faces various natural calamities such as flood, storm, cyclone, drought, nor'wester, earthquake and soil erosion (ধস) almost every year. So, it is called a land of natural calamities. The effects of natural calamities are beyond description. Flood is almost an annual calamity in Bangladesh. It damages crops, destroys houses and washes away cattle and property. It also claims huge lives every year. If hampers the normal way of life. Natural calamities are frequent-in Bangladesh. So, the people of Bangladesh live with disasters. It tells on the economy of the country tremendously ( মারাত্মকভাবে). To prevent natural calamities, we should take some steps. Environmental pollution must be stopped to keep ecological balance that may check natural calamities to a great extent. The developing countries which are the victims of greenhouse effect are the worst sufferers of natural calamities. The general mass, particularly, the people of the coastal areas often visited by natural calamities, must be made, aware of the natural calamities. Bangladesh. Betar and television channels should warn the general masses about the latest weather forecast.

questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on 'Moral Degradation' showing its causes; effects and solution within 200 words.

sub_questions.explanation:
The Causes and Effects of Moral Degradation of Young Generation
Moral values are those set of standards by. which we distinguish between right and wrong. Degradation (অবক্ষষয়)' of moral 'values or moral degradation among the younger generation is an emerging issue. The erosion in moral values has taken a dangerous turn. The revolution in science and technology . has made our life easy and reachable. But, we should realize that our moral degradation is making our society ruthless (নিষ্ঠুর) than ever. We had a rich culture where people respected each other and there was harmony in the community in religious and social issues. But today when we keep eyes in'the dailies, we cannot but be ashamed and thundered as we have to see the news of pervading cruelty, notoriousness, rape, bribery, killing, trafficking, adulteration of food, medicine, leaking of question papers and what not. But what is causing our society to engage in such ominous (অশুভ/ভীতিজনক) deeds? We don't need to go far to seek the answer. It is nothing but lack of moral teaching and religious counselling in educational and social institutions. The greed for money and power, injustice and discrimination in society, excessive desire or mania to gain something illegally and disrespecting the law of the country are also the causes of present degradation of moral or social values among the youths. But, time is passing away fast to think over the issues. So, it is time that recovery must be started from the grass roots and the leaders, parents, teachers, and other social stakeholders must understand that the need of the moment is to acknowledge the most heinous moral degradation.
